overview: Wahyu (16 years old) has an extraordinary skill of football. He lives in Langitan village at the slope of Mount Bromo with his father, a warm drink vendor for the tourists around the volcanic site, and mother. In order to make his parents happy, Wahyu uses his football skill to become a freelance player, playing football for one village team after another with the help of his uncle, Hasan. Pak Darto, Wahyuâ€™s father, really despises what Wahyu does.
title: Tendangan Dari Langit
